updates.description: The Excel API v1.3 update provides developers with new capabilities to interact with Excel workbooks and their data. It includes new endpoints for manipulating charts, tables, and conditional formatting rules. It also supports more types of data validation and allows for more control over workbook and worksheet properties.
updates.automation_value: This update can save time and reduce manual work by allowing developers to automate more tasks related to data manipulation and presentation in Excel. It also provides more control over the workbook and worksheet properties, which can be used to automate setup and configuration tasks.
updates.business_impact: The update can increase productivity by reducing the time spent on manual tasks, allowing for more focus on strategic tasks. It also enhances data accuracy and consistency, which can improve decision-making.

updates.description: The Excel Automation Add-in provides users with a set of tools for automating common tasks in Excel. It includes features for batch processing of data, automatic generation of reports, and scheduling of tasks.
updates.automation_value: This add-in can save users significant time by automating common tasks such as data processing and report generation. It also allows for tasks to be scheduled, which can further reduce manual work by ensuring that tasks are performed at the optimal time.
updates.business_impact: This add-in can streamline workflows and improve efficiency, leading to cost savings and improved productivity. It also enables tasks to be performed at optimal times, which can improve operational efficiency.

updates.description: This update enhances the integration between Excel and Power Automate, Microsoft's workflow automation tool. It allows for more complex workflows to be created that involve Excel, and includes new triggers and actions for Excel in Power Automate.
updates.automation_value: This update can save time and reduce manual work by allowing for more complex workflows involving Excel to be automated. It also provides new triggers and actions for Excel in Power Automate, which can be used to automate a wider range of tasks.
updates.business_impact: This update can improve business processes by enabling more complex workflows to be automated, reducing the chance of errors and increasing efficiency. It also enhances integration with other Microsoft tools, which can improve overall system efficiency.

updates.description: The Excel Smart Fill feature uses machine learning to automatically fill in data based on patterns it detects in the data. It can be used to fill in missing data, generate new data based on existing data, or transform data into a different format.
updates.automation_value: This feature can save users time by automatically filling in data, which can reduce the amount of manual data entry required. It can also help to ensure that data is consistent and accurate, which can save time on data cleaning and validation tasks.
updates.business_impact: This feature can enhance data accuracy and consistency, leading to better decision-making. It also reduces manual data entry, which can save time and reduce the chance of errors.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: Excel API v1.3
   Release Date: November 15, 2023
   Description: The Excel API v1.3 update provides developers with new capabilities to interact with Excel workbooks and their data. It includes new endpoints for manipulating charts, tables, and conditional formatting rules. It also supports more types of data validation and allows for more control over workbook and worksheet properties.
   Automation Value: This update can save time and reduce manual work by allowing developers to automate more tasks related to data manipulation and presentation in Excel. It also provides more control over the workbook and worksheet properties, which can be used to automate setup and configuration tasks.

2. Update Name: Excel Automation Add-in
   Release Date: March 1, 2024
   Description: The Excel Automation Add-in provides users with a set of tools for automating common tasks in Excel. It includes features for batch processing of data, automatic generation of reports, and scheduling of tasks.
   Automation Value: This add-in can save users significant time by automating common tasks such as data processing and report generation. It also allows for tasks to be scheduled, which can further reduce manual work by ensuring that tasks are performed at the optimal time.

3. Update Name: Excel Integration with Power Automate
   Release Date: July 30, 2025
   Description: This update enhances the integration between Excel and Power Automate, Microsoft's workflow automation tool. It allows for more complex workflows to be created that involve Excel, and includes new triggers and actions for Excel in Power Automate.
   Automation Value: This update can save time and reduce manual work by allowing for more complex workflows involving Excel to be automated. It also provides new triggers and actions for Excel in Power Automate, which can be used to automate a wider range of tasks.

4. Update Name: Excel Smart Fill
   Release Date: September 15, 2025
   Description: The Excel Smart Fill feature uses machine learning to automatically fill in data based on patterns it detects in the data. It can be used to fill in missing data, generate new data based on existing data, or transform data into a different format.
   Automation Value: This feature can save users time by automatically filling in data, which can reduce the amount of manual data entry required. It can also help to ensure that data is consistent and accurate, which can save time on data cleaning and validation tasks.
